message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. We've had a lot of interest in this product, and I think you'll find it's a great opportunity. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I have to consider the product's value to me as well. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $925000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's worth to you and the initial offer I made.
I appreciate the compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. However, I need to ensure I get a good return on my investment. I'm willing to offer it to you for $920000. This is the lowest I can go, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
